CustomField.formula:
IF( NOT(ISBLANK(ProductCatalogue__c)), IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(FluidRecipeId__c)), ISNUMBER(FluidRecipeId__c), LEN(FluidRecipeId__c) = 8 ), $Setup.ProductSettings__c.FluidPictureUrl__c & FluidRecipeId__c & '/image/', IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(FluidRecipeId__c)), NOT(ISNUMBER(FluidRecipeId__c)), UPPER(LEFT(FluidRecipeId__c, 1)) = 'T', LEN(FluidRecipeId__c) = 8 ), 'https://lv-api.3kit.com/api/configurations/' + FluidRecipeId__c + '/image/', '' ) ), '' )
/* IF (AND(NOT(ISBLANK(ProductCatalogue__c)),NOT(ISBLANK(FluidRecipeId__c))), $Setup.ProductSettings__c.FluidPictureUrl__c & FluidRecipeId__c & "/image/", "" ) */
CustomField.label: TECH Product Img Base URL
